name: Supernatural Speed Dating
description:
"You are a single human desperate to get laid."

Thus begins Supernatural Speed Dating, a game in which you attempt to woo various otherworldly entities, from an ex-guardian angel to a dangerous faerie queen. Whether or not you succeed depends on your quick with and silver tongue.

This visual novel was developed during EPX Studio's 2017 game jam, by Alic Szecsei and Gillian Herrin.
